name: Yandere Limit demo
description:
What limits will the Yandere's go for your heart? 


(Note)

If you have problems running this game in firefox, try another browser. Google Chrome seems to work well. If that still will not work, you can download the windows version. 


Controls:

Directional keys move - or can click around to walk forward.

Q and E to straggle left or right. 

Push esp or click right top of screen to open menu.

click or press space to interact with objects. 

Interact with the book by clicking on it. 


----------------------------------------------------------------------
Credits:

Music/Skytric

programming/events - Skytric and some script work.
